dcterms:creator: S.C. Shadden
F. Lekien
J.E. Marsden
dcterms:description: The Double Gyre dataset is a well-known analytical flow field used to study fluid dynamics and Lagrangian coherent structures. It is defined by a time-varying vector field that is frequently utilized for the computation of hyperbolic Lagrangian coherent structures in flow data.
dcterms:title: Double Gyre

dcterms:creator: J. Jakob
M. Gross
T. Gunther
dcterms:description: The 2D fluid dynamics machine learning dataset is generated using the Gerris flow solver and is designed for machine learning applications in fluid dynamics. It includes a variety of flow scenarios and is used to train models for tasks such as neural flow map interpolation.
dcterms:title: 2D fluid dynamics machine learning dataset
